title: I went mid as kaisa got lp for adc
body: Like title says I went mid kaisa but somehow I got lp for bot lane what the heck? Is this how its supposed to be? So if I play kog mid Ill get lp for adc too?

replies.body: I went {{champion:90}} mid, didn't get LP because they don't know where he's supposed to be played anymore.

> [{quoted}](name=deadlychuck,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=A7d8ymKh,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-02-09T03:44:48.870+0000)
>
> I went {{champion:90}} mid, didn't get LP because they don't know where he's supposed to be played anymore.

He's played as an ult button
{{sticker:sg-lulu}}

I can 1 up that. He's played as a single button. 
You can literally keybind his skills to a single macro and play him to a reasonable degree.
If you go Cass the system reverts itself
i lold.
You wont be gaining any lp if you go kog friend...

depends. He's still very aggressive and fairly powerful with his long range

he's also still "protect the koggle" champ class of immobile and frail
You used the word protect and (insert adc champ) in the same sentence. LMAO!!

> [{quoted}](name=DarkmoonDiana,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=A7d8ymKh,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-02-09T04:31:21.693+0000)
>
> You wont be gaining any lp if you go kog friend...

protect the adc is back if you havent heard yet. It's very real. Good luck dealing with a fed caitlin when she one shots your whole team after a mild snowball if she's any good.

Or lucian. Or vayne if she gets fed. ADC reign of terror is back. You heard it here, folks. It just hasnt caught on completely yet.
I've been steamrolled by a couple of Cait's the past few days. She's looking a little too strong.
Nice, so If I go Quinn ADC I'll get lp for top? {{sticker:sg-syndra}}

> [{quoted}](name=Wild Geese,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=A7d8ymKh,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-02-09T02:47:02.066+0000)
>
> Nice, so If I go Quinn ADC I'll get lp for top? {{sticker:sg-syndra}}

Of all the scum and villainy of the world. You utter bastard lmao
NICE! I can't wait to get Jungle LP for going {{champion:1}}  mid
https://i.redd.it/co99u9t5obs01.jpg

go top {{champion:103}} {{summoner:11}} {{item:3301}} 

and give us the result
from my experience the LP you gain is based on where you mostly where for th early game so you cant lane swap which is bad

few days ago i had troll veigar support that forced me out of my adc role by taking cs and kill stealing and match making thought i swapped to supp.

guess it worked out fine cuz we lost that game and i was still in placements for supp role so... i kinda didnt lose anything.
this thing stay away from eune i don't want troubles playing as ashe.. xd
You changer in champ select?
You should report a bug if you didn't actually play bot lane. It helps get these problems fixed in a more timely manner.
For the 1st 10 minutes or so, where did you spend most of your time?

> [{quoted}](name=Jeddy017,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=A7d8ymKh,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2019-02-10T00:30:57.749+0000)
>
> For the 1st 10 minutes or so, where did you spend most of your time?

If a couple ganks to the lower side of the map reassigns your role and assumes two ADCs the system is very fucked

Reksai occasionally pops up as Support in the API due to her massive presence bot lane following an ADC leash on her first camp. 
Not so much anymore with scuttle changes i guess
Wait... position ranks are released already? Are they testing it in NA but not other regions or am I simply stupid? :l
Yes, they're testing it in NA & Korea before rolling out to other regions.
Lmfao, there's a role queue and the game has systems to check how long you were standing in a lane.  I don't know how they fudge things like this.
I guess my random Sivir or Varus Mid will be counted as ADC?
Wondering where would {{champion:59}}  support end up. Jungle if he roams ? Some systems prefer to treat him as adc rather than support.
